BackstoryDef.title: corporate scientist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Interstellar warfare is won by technology, so corporate navies are always on the peak of modern research. Some Beta-Humanoids are created specifically to avoid Human qualms about the destructive potential of the tech being created. Even better, they have first access to archotechnological artifacts because they find them in space.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] worked in a corporate lab.

BackstoryDef.title: glitterworld empath
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had an amazing ability to relate to others and mediate conflict. [PAWN_pronoun] created to serve as an empath. The programing instilled during the creation process intensified [PAWN_possessive] natural abilities, but [PAWN_pronoun] became unable to harm others.

BackstoryDef.title: glitterworld surgeon
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a surgeon on a world mostly free of disease and human suffering.\n\n [PAWN_possessive] job mostly involved elaborate and creative cosmetic surgeries. [PAWN_pronoun] has a good understanding of human biology, but never had to remove a cancer â€” or a bullet.

BackstoryDef.title: corporate officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Though glitterworlds are peaceful places, they often remain prepared for war. [PAWN_nameDef]'s unit rarely saw any real action.\n\n Though [PAWN_pronoun] pursued [PAWN_possessive] artistic hobbies, [PAWN_possessive] subordinates preferred to entertain themselves by brawling, so [PAWN_nameDef] got good at breaking up fights.

BackstoryDef.title: architect
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] designed and constructed buildings. On [PAWN_possessive] corporate master's glitterworld home, most of the technical aspects of architecture were handled by an AI. This enabled [PAWN_objective] to push the artistic limits of the craft, but also meant [PAWN_pronoun] never had to get [PAWN_possessive] hands dirty at building sites.

BackstoryDef.title: sculptor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] started off sculpting person-sized chunks of stone, but [PAWN_pronoun] soon began to think bigger. With the help of mining robots, [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to carve huge monuments out of cliffsides. Soon the corporate parks of the glitterworld where [PAWN_pronoun] lived were full of giant rock figures.
